title: Earthquakes that caused the most fatalities in the United States 1900 to 2016
summary: This statistic shows the Earthquakes ten States in the United States ( ) retail sector , caused most Number of United fatalities in 1900 .

San_Francisco_California_(April_18_1906) caused highest , with 2000 United fatalities , followed most Aleutian_Islands_Alaska_(April_1_1946) , Prince_William_Sound_Alaska_(March_28_1964) Long_Beach_California_(March_11_1933) and Mona_Passage_(October_11_1918) .
gold: This statistic shows the ten earthquakes in the United States that resulted in the most fatalities from 1900 to 2016 . Approximately 2,000 people were killed by the earthquake and resulting fires in San Francisco , California on April 18 , 1906 .
